notes: mass noun; also used countably for types or bottles

example_sentence_english: The wine is on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono molti vini in enoteca.
example_sentence_english: There are many wines at the wine shop.

example_sentence_italian: I vini sono esposti per la degustazione.
example_sentence_english: The wines are displayed for tasting.

example_sentence_italian: Il colore del vino è intenso.
example_sentence_english: The color of the wine is intense.

example_sentence_italian: La macchia dal vino è difficile da togliere.
example_sentence_english: The wine stain is hard to remove.

example_sentence_italian: Ho sentito aromi dai vini assaggiati.
example_sentence_english: I smelled aromas from the wines tasted.

example_sentence_italian: Nel vino si sentono note di frutta.
example_sentence_english: In the wine one can taste notes of fruit.

example_sentence_italian: Nei vini rossi si trovano tannini.
example_sentence_english: In red wines there are tannins.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una recensione sul vino.
example_sentence_english: I read a review about the wine.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto articoli sui vini italiani.
example_sentence_english: I read articles about Italian wines.
The roast is cooked with wine.

example_sentence_italian: Abbina i formaggi coi vini appropriati.
example_sentence_english: Pair cheeses with the appropriate wines.
